item.title: Laravel Artisan Backend Call
item.description: Preface If you need to execute a script programmatically in the background in your project, with the official Artisan::call() call, if the script takes too long, the process will be interrupted and the script will not execute successfully, so you need to hang the execution in the background. Artisan Command Line Tools Please refer to the official documentation. Called programmatically 1 2 3 4 5 <?
